title: Denali National Park & Preserve: Alpine Tundra
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia     Webcams     Alpine Tundra                Alpine Tundra                       Alpine Tundra Have you ever wanted to check conditions for hiking, skiing, and other outdoor activities along the Denali Park Road corridor west of Park Headquarters? A new Alpine Tundra webcam, perched high atop a shoulder of Mount Healy along the park’s Outer Range, offers a westward perspective for several miles beyond the entrance area. Snow and extreme conditions may obscure the view at times. The image is set to refresh several times each minute.   View webcam               Learn more about a variety of landscape types throughout the park.   See for yourself through a study of repeat photography how this area has changed over time.   Explore online resources about factors that shape weather and climate in Denali.
